body:
Make it possible to add new lightsabers styles instead of replacing existing ones. Backhanded sabers are a popular example.

But also make it possible to use them as overrides instead for vanilla compatibility.

Once I have #9, I might be interested to create a [lightsaber tonfa](https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Guard_shoto/Legends) sample style.

milestone.title: Tools
milestone.description: Make the game easier to mod.

title: New saber styles
